EmailTemplate.subject: Volunteer at Ealing Vaisakhi Festival!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Help Ealing celebrate Vaisakhi!
Baisakhi Festival marks the beginning of the solar year. People of North India, particularly Punjab thank God for good harvest. Visit to Gurudwaras, Vaisakhi processions and traditional performances are the highlights of the day. Baisakhi has special significance for Sikhs as on this day in 1699, their tenth Guru Gobind Singh Ji organized the order of the Khalsa.
http://www.baisakhifestival.com/
We are looking for 12 volunteers to help with the celebrations - Feel free to bring a friend!
Vital details:
When: Saturday 26th April
Times: 13:00 - 16:00
Where: Jubilee Gardens Library
What?
Meeting & greeting the attendees
Serving the snacks
Taking contact details of the attendees
Marshaling young children
Putting the programme together
Setting-up the music
Helping with the tidying-up
To declare your interest just reply SIGN ME UP to this email!
I look forward to receiving your positive response,
Amy
The Challenge Society
